title: Belle Pink Electric Pen Shape Nail Drill Art Manicure File Tool 6 Bits
description: Bellehome-Make Belle at homeProduct Advantages:*** Quiet and smooth, accepts all rotary tool accessories; Double Bearings Design and Double Insulated*** For professional studio use or home use*** Light weight drill makes working all day easy to do*** Modern design looks great in any home or salonSpecifications:* Color: Pink* Voltage: 110V ,60Hz* Size: 16cm (L) x 2.4cm (Diameter)Package includes:1 * Belle Electric Pen-Shape Nail Drill(Pink)1 * AC adapter6 * Sanding Bands Bits1 * User manual (in English)NOTE:You couldn't insert one bit directly.We will email the user tips to you which show how to insert the bit to the handpiece in 1-2 business days after your order, please read it carefully before you use.Or pls check the 2nd image and follow the below steps.How to Install :Step 1: Press shaft lock button, rotate the collet nut anticlockwise (but do not take the nut out)Step 2: Insert the bit, press shaft lock button and tighten the collet nut clockwise securely. But avoid excess tightening of the collet nut in case of damage in the nut.Step 3: connect the cord.Step 4: When using the product to drill your nail, you can adjust the rotating speed by sliding the speed switch. (Caution: Please avoid pressing or touch the shaft lock button during using the product to drill your nail.)Step 5: unscrew the nut and change other bits as you do it in step 1~step 3. (For your safety, unplug the cord before you change the bits.)

A perfect set tool for your nail art and beauty. 15 Nail Art Design Painting Pen Polish Brush Set Consist Of :3x Drawing Tools / 7x Painting Tools (also can use as gel nail curing brush) / 2x Liners / 1x Dotting Tool / 2x Fan brushes for nail art effect (also can use as eye shadow brush). Package Content: 1 x 15pcs Nail Art Painting Pen Brush.

title: Set of 3 Sable NAIL ART Brushes Pen, Detailer Liner and Striper
description: * A lovely set of brushes made from golden taklon. The hairs are mounted on pointed bronze tips and they have a pen like appearance for ease of use. * Special designed for finest detailing tasks, like painting leaves, flower petals.
